creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
life_date: Taguchi Beisaku ; Mizuno Asajirō, Publisher, Japanese
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
title: Picture of Major General Ōshima’s Heroic Counterintelligence during the Fierce Battle in Snow and Ice at Haicheng of the Righteous Forces’ Campaign against Qing
